channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.

item.title: Natural Gas Lower as Weather Forecast Moderates
item.description: Natural gas futures were down 0.5% with forecasts for a cooler East Coast in the near-term.

item.title: Gold Gains on Middle East Escalation Fears
item.description: Gold prices gain more than 1% as risks of an all-out war in the Middle East boost safe-haven demand.

item.title: Darden Restaurants earnings disappoint as Olive Garden, fine dining sales struggle
item.description: Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants reported weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: Nike reports earnings after the bell. Here's what Wall Street expects
item.description: Nike is in a reset after critics say it lost sight of innovation and ceded share to competitors. Its CEO John Donahoe is slated to step down this mont...

item.title: H&M shares fall as much as 8% on profit miss and scrapped earnings margin target
item.description: Shares of H&M tumbled as much as 8% on Thursday after the world's second-largest listed fashion retailer posted a miss on operating profit.

item.title: Oil Turns Higher on Israeli Incursion Into Lebanon
item.description: Oil futures got a boost from Israel’s heightened operations in Lebanon, and worries about possible retaliation from Iran, leading to a broader and big...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall, Oil Climbs on Middle East Conflict
item.description: Major U.S. stock indexes declined and oil prices jumped after the White House said an attack by Iran on Israel was imminent.

item.title: We're upping our price target on Costco after another steady quarter fortifies our thesis
item.description: The retailer's fourth-quarter results were mixed, but we have more conviction in Costco's appeal to shoppers.

item.title: Euro's Outlook Sours as Inflation Cools
item.description: The euro’s outlook looks less bright given cooling eurozone inflation, Middle East tensions and political instability in France, spreadbetting firm Ci...
